column2: "Paul dze Hebriw kasa see dɛ
column3: Enuanom nye egyanom
column4: hom ntsie m’anoyi a miriyi akyerɛ hom yi."

column2: "Na wɔtsee dɛ ɔrekasa kyerɛ hɔn wɔ Hebriw kasa mu no
column3: wɔyɛɛ komm koraa: na ɔsee dɛ:"

column2: "Meyɛ Jewnyi a wɔwoo me wɔ Tarsus wɔ Silisia
column3: na wɔtsetsee me kurow yi mu
column4: wɔ Gamaliel anan ho
column5: wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ me egyanom mbra no mu ketsee
column7: dɛ mbrɛ hom nyina yɛ ndɛ yi;"

column2: "na meyɛɛ Ɔkwan yi do akadofo ayakayakadze kɔr owu mu
column3: mekyekyeer mbarimba nye mbaa
column4: na miyii hɔn mae

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɔfopanyin no so nye mpanyimfo nyina dzi me dase no: hɔn hɔ so na mekɛgyee nwoma dɛ medze rekɛma enuanom no
column3: mokɔr Damaskɔs dɛ merekɛfa hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ no so aba Jerusalɛm wɔ nkyehoma mu
column4: ma wɔaatsea hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ menam na mebɛɛn Damaskɔs bɛyɛ wigyinae no
column3: awerɛfir mu na kan kɛse fi sor bɛhyerɛnee botwaa mo ho hyiae."

column2: "Na mohwee daadze
column3: na metsee ndze bi a ɔsee me dɛ
column4: Saul
column6: ɔyɛ dɛn na etaa mo do yi?"

column2: "Na mubuaa dɛ
column3: Woana nye wo
column4: Ewuradze? Na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: Emi nye Nazarɛtnyi Jesus a etaa no do no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnye me nam no hun kan no dze
column3: naaso wɔanntse nyia ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me no ne ndze."

column2: "Na mesee dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na menyɛ
column4: Ewuradze? Na Ewuradze see me dɛ
column7: na hɔ na wɔbɛka wo dza wɔahyɛ wo dɛ yɛ nyina ho asɛm."

column2: "Na kan no ne hyerɛn kɛse ntsi munnhu adze no
column3: hɔn a wɔnye me nam no susuoo me nsa dze me baa Damaskɔs."

column2: "Na Ananias bi a ɔyɛ nyamesuronyi dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse
column3: na Jewfo a wɔwɔ hɔ nyina bɔɔ no dzin pa no
column5: "baa mo hɔ begyinaa me nkyɛn see me dɛ
column7: hu adze. Na dɔn no ara mu na memaa m’enyi do hwɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hɛn egyanom Nyankopɔn no eyi wo ato hɔ dɛ ihu ne pɛ
column4: na ihu ɔtseneneenyi no

column2: "Na ebɛyɛ ne dasefo ama nyimpa nyina wɔ dza ehu nye dza atse ho."
"Na afei
column3: ebɛnadze ntsi na irikyinkyim? Soɛr ma wonnuma wo nhohor wo bɔn
column4: na paa mu bɔ ne dzin no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ mesanee baa Jerusalɛm
column3: na morobɔ mpaa wɔ asɔrfi mu no
column4: m’enyiwa wiaa me ma mokɔr tsebea fofor mu
column6: "na muhun no na ɔsee me dɛ
column8: osiandɛ wɔrenngye wo dasee a ibedzi wɔ mo ho no."

column2: "Na mesee dɛ
column3: Ewuradze
column4: hɔnankasa nyim dɛ hɔn a wɔgye wo dzi nyina medze hɔn guu efiadze
column5: na mohwee hɔn nhyiamudan nyina mu;"

column2: "na wɔreka wo dasefo Stefen no bɔgyaa egu no
column3: mo so migyinaa hɔ bi
column4: na mepeen no wu do
column5: na mohwɛɛ hɔn a wokum no no hɔn ntar do."

column2: "Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Kɔ
column4: na morosoma wo efi ha akɔ ekyirekyir wɔ amanaman mu."

column2: "Na wotsiee no besii asɛm yi do
column3: na wɔmaa hɔn ndze do see dɛ
column4: Wonyi dɛm nyimpa yi mfi asaase do: na ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔbɛtsena ase."

column2: "Na woruhuro
column3: na wɔrotow hɔn ntar gu
column4: na worutu huntuma gu wimu no
column6: "safohen panyin no hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa no mbra aban mu
column7: na ɔkaa dɛ wɔnka no mpire mbisa no asɛm
column8: ama oeehu adze kor a osian ntsi ma woruhuro gu no do yi."

column2: "Na wɔdze nguanhoma dweer ne nsa no
column3: Paul see ɔhamupanyin a ogyinaa hɔ no dɛ
column4: Ana hom wɔ kwan dɛ hom ka nyimpa a ɔyɛ Romenyi na wommbuu no fɔ mpire?"

column2: "Na ɔhamupanyin no tsee no
column3: ɔkɔr safohen panyin no hɔ kɛkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na erebɛyɛ yi? Hwɛ

column2: "Na safohen panyin no bae bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Sɛ eyɛ Romenyi a
column4: ka kyerɛ me. Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsafohen panyin no buaa dɛ
column3: Medze sika kɛse na medze nyaa ɔmambayɛ yi. Na Paul see dɛ
column4: Emi dze

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ntsɛmara hɔn a nkyɛ woribebisa no asɛm no fii ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsafohen panyin no so hun dɛ ɔyɛ Romenyi na dɛ ɔakyekyer no no
column4: osuroi."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: na ɔpɛɛ dɛ ohu siantsir a ɔnam do ma Jewfo nye no robɔ nkuro no mu nokwar no
column4: ɔsaan no na ɔhyɛɛ asɔfompanyin nye baguafo no nyina dɛ wombehyia
column5: na ɔdze Paul sianee bae begyinaa hɔn enyim."
